long_description: Built stretchy and tough for mountain terrain, the men's Black Diamond B.D.V.Climbing Pants feature a harness-compatible waist, climbing-specific gusset and articulated knees for high-stepping. Made of Schoeller(R) stretch-woven soft-shell fabric with NanoSphere(R) technology that resists water, oil and dirt. Climbing-specific gusset and articulate knees free up leg mobility. Black Diamond B.D.V.Climbing Pants have adjustable drawcord cuffs to seal out snow and moisture. Harness-compatible, internal ladder-lock waistbelt dials in the fit. Zippered hand pockets; 1 zip rear pocket; 1 cargo pocket with rip-and-stick closure.
short_description: Built stretchy and tough for mountain terrain, the men's Black Diamond B.D.V.Climbing Pants feature a harness-compatible waist, climbing-specific gusset and articulated knees for high-stepping.
